column1: Wethouders zien forse instroom in bijstand - vooral jongeren met flexbaan
column2: Aldermen see strong inflows in assistance - especially young people with flex track

column8: Millions of euros and a lot of effort took the Hague last year to reduce the number of people on welfare by 3.6 percent. And now, in a few weeks time, we return to a 15 percent increase, says alderman Bert van Alpe ... [+6545 chars]
